articles.title: Canada's foreign affairs minister returning early from Europe trip amid rising Ukraine tensions - CBC News
articles.description: Canadian Foreign Affairs Minister Mélanie Joly is cancelling part of her trip to Europe amid ongoing tensions in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Canadian Foreign Affairs Minister Mélanie Joly is cancelling part of her trip to Europe amid ongoing tensions in Ukraine.
Joly recently finished a meeting of G7 foreign ministers in Munich, where th… [+1785 chars]
